feature._sql: select feature_0.timeaccessioned, feature_0.name, feature_0.timelastmodified, feature_0.residues, feature_0.dbxref_id, feature_0.is_obsolete, feature_0.feature_id, feature_0.uniquename, feature_0.seqlen, feature_0.md5checksum, feature_0.organism_id, feature_0.type_id, feature_0.is_analysis from feature feature_0 where feature_0.is_analysis=false and feature_0.is_obsolete=false and feature_0.uniquename ~'^FB(gn|te)[0-9]+$' order by feature_0.name;
